original_text:
3Diamonds FashionTV
La prima cosa che balza agli occhi quando ci troviamo di fronte a 3 Diamonds FashionTV, è l’originalità del tema: un canale tv dedicato all’extralusso e a tutto il mondo che lo circonda. Il primo impatto con la slot è una presentazione animata che assomiglia molto a quelle tipiche di film e programmi tv. Dopo l’introduzione (che possiamo anche decidere di saltare), la schermata si apre sulla griglia di gioco. Lo sfondo è una città notturna con così tante luci da sembrare quasi dorata. Ai lati della griglia abbiamo due pannelli, quello sulla destra ci augura buona fortuna, quello di sinistra è uno speciale accumulatore di cui vedremo la funzione più in là.
In basso troviamo diversi tasti, dallo Start al variatore di puntata, oltre a quello che ci permette di accedere al menù interno.
Caratteristiche della slot
In 3 Diamonds FashionTV la griglia ha 4 rulli e 3 linee. Si vince associando simboli identici e adiacenti a partire dal rullo di sinistra  e procedendo verso destra. Ci sono sino a 108 modi per vincere e nel caso di più combinazioni sulla stessa linea, verrà pagata solo la vincita più alta. Attraverso il variatore di puntata possiamo decidere l’importo da scommettere per ogni giro. Contando che di un singolo gettone è di 0,01 € e la giocata minima allo step 1 ne richiede 50, allora un singolo spin ci costerà 0,50 €.
Uno dei punti di forza di questa slot è di sicuro il valore RTP molto alto, pari al 97,34%. La volatilità è media.
Simboli e funzionalità
Per conoscere il valore dei simboli, ci basterà puntare il mouse su ognuno di essi quando i rulli sono fermi. La scritta Bar ha un valore basso, a seguire troviamo le fragole, la stella e l’orologio. Per iniziare a vedere qualche cifra davvero interessante bisogna però puntare sull’auto, sulla carta di credito o sui lingotti, a meno che non si abbia la fortuna di vedere comparire il diamante!
Abbiamo poi due simboli speciali con la doppia funzione di Wild e Scatter. Si tratta delle bottiglie di champagne, che sono simboli a espansione e quando compaiono vanno a coprire l’intero rullo. Oltretutto ricompensano con dei Free Spins. Il numero di giri gratuiti dipende dal rullo in cui compare il simbolo.
Veniamo ora alla funzione denominata Special Prize: a ogni vincita ottenuta da noi, ma anche dagli altri giocatori che in quel momento sono su 3 Diamonds FashionTV, un importo extra andrà a rimpinguare un contatore speciale con diversi livelli. Dopo aver raggiunto la soglia del primo, ci verrà chiesto se incassare o passare al livello successivo. Abbiamo trenta secondi per decidere. Durante questo tempo il premio potrà aumentare in base alle giocate degli altri utenti, ma anche diminuire nel caso un altro giocatore ha raggiunto il nostro stesso traguardo e deciderà di ritirare il premio prima di noi.

raw_translation.response:
3Diamonds FashionTV
The first thing that catches the eye when we face 3 Diamonds FashionTV is the originality of the theme: a TV channel dedicated to luxury and everything that surrounds it. The first impact with the slot is an animated presentation that looks very similar to those typical of movies and TV shows. After the introduction (which we can also decide to skip), the screen opens onto the game grid. The background is a nighttime city with so many lights that it almost looks golden. On the sides of the grid we have two panels, the one on the right wishes us good luck, while the one on the left is a special accumulator whose function we will see later on. 
At the bottom we find various buttons, from the Start to the bet variable, as well as the one that allows us to access the internal menu. 

Slot Features
In 3 Diamonds FashionTV the grid has 4 reels and 3 rows. We win by associating identical and adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. There are up to 108 ways to win and in case of multiple combinations on the same line, only the highest win will be paid. Through the bet variable we can decide the amount to bet for each spin. Considering that a single token is worth 0.01€ and the minimum bet at step 1 requires 50, then a single spin will cost us 0.50€.
One of the strengths of this slot is definitely the very high RTP value, equal to 97.34%. The volatility is medium. 

Symbols and Features
To know the value of the symbols, we just need to point the mouse on each of them when the reels are still. The Bar text has a low value, followed by the strawberries, star, and clock. However, to start seeing some really interesting figures, we must bet on the car, on the credit card or on the ingots, unless we are lucky enough to see the diamond appear!

We then have two special symbols with the double function of Wild and Scatter. These are the champagne bottles, which are expansion symbols and when they appear they cover the whole reel. Moreover, they reward us with Free Spins. The number of free spins depends on the reel where the symbol appears. 

Now let's come to the function called Special Prize: for each win we obtain, but also from other players who are currently on 3 Diamonds FashionTV, an extra amount goes to a special counter with different levels. After reaching the threshold of the first level, we will be asked whether to cash out or move on to the next level. We have thirty seconds to decide. During this time, the prize may increase based on the plays of other users, but also decrease if another player has reached our same goal and decides to withdraw the prize before us.
raw_translation.role: You are an experienced translator from any language to English.

message.content:
3Diamonds FashionTV
The first thing that catches the eye when we face 3 Diamonds FashionTV is the originality of the theme: a TV channel dedicated to luxury and everything that surrounds it. The first impact with the slot is an animated presentation that looks very similar to those typical of movies and TV shows. After the introduction (which we can also decide to skip), the screen opens onto the game grid. The background is a nighttime city with so many lights that it almost looks golden. On the sides of the grid we have two panels, the one on the right wishes us good luck, while the one on the left is a special accumulator whose function we will see later on. 
At the bottom we find various buttons, from the Start to the bet variable, as well as the one that allows us to access the internal menu. 

Slot Features
In 3 Diamonds FashionTV the grid has 4 reels and 3 rows. We win by associating identical and adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. There are up to 108 ways to win and in case of multiple combinations on the same line, only the highest win will be paid. Through the bet variable we can decide the amount to bet for each spin. Considering that a single token is worth 0.01€ and the minimum bet at step 1 requires 50, then a single spin will cost us 0.50€.
One of the strengths of this slot is definitely the very high RTP value, equal to 97.34%. The volatility is medium. 

Symbols and Features
To know the value of the symbols, we just need to point the mouse on each of them when the reels are still. The Bar text has a low value, followed by the strawberries, star, and clock. However, to start seeing some really interesting figures, we must bet on the car, on the credit card or on the ingots, unless we are lucky enough to see the diamond appear!

We then have two special symbols with the double function of Wild and Scatter. These are the champagne bottles, which are expansion symbols and when they appear they cover the whole reel. Moreover, they reward us with Free Spins. The number of free spins depends on the reel where the symbol appears. 

Now let's come to the function called Special Prize: for each win we obtain, but also from other players who are currently on 3 Diamonds FashionTV, an extra amount goes to a special counter with different levels. After reaching the threshold of the first level, we will be asked whether to cash out or move on to the next level. We have thirty seconds to decide. During this time, the prize may increase based on the plays of other users, but also decrease if another player has reached our same goal and decides to withdraw the prize before us.

message.content:
3Diamonds FashionTV 

The first thing that catches your eye when you come across 3Diamonds FashionTV is the originality of the theme: a TV channel dedicated to luxury and everything that surrounds it. The first encounter with the slot is an animated presentation that looks very similar to those typical of movies and TV shows. After the introduction (which we can also choose to skip), the screen opens onto the game grid. The background is a night city with so many lights that it almost appears golden. On either side of the grid, we have two panels, the one on the right wishing us good luck, and the one on the left being a special accumulator whose function we will see later.

At the bottom, we find different buttons from Start to the bet variable, as well as the one that allows us to access the internal menu. 

Slot Features 

In 3Diamonds FashionTV, the grid has 4 reels and 3 lines. You win by associating identical and adjacent symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding towards the right. There are up to 108 ways to win, and in case of multiple combinations on the same line, only the highest win will be paid. Through the bet variable, we can decide the amount to bet for each spin. Considering that a single token is €0.01, and the minimum bet at step 1 requires 50, then a single spin will cost us €0.50.

One of the strengths of this slot is undoubtedly the very high RTP value, equal to 97.34%. The volatility is average.

Symbols and Features 

To know the value of the symbols, we just need to point the mouse at each one of them when the reels are still. The Bar sign has a low value, followed by strawberries, star, and clock. However, to see some really interesting numbers, we must focus on the car, credit card, or ingots, unless we are lucky enough to see the diamond appear!

We then have two special symbols with the dual function of Wild and Scatter. These are champagne bottles, which are expansion symbols, and when they appear, they cover the entire reel. Furthermore, they reward us with Free Spins. The number of free spins depends on the reel in which the symbol appears.

Now we come to the function called Special Prize: for every win obtained by us, but also by other players who are currently on 3Diamonds FashionTV, an extra amount will go to a special counter with different levels. After reaching the threshold of the first level, we will be asked whether to cash out or move to the next level. We have thirty seconds to decide. During this time, the prize may increase based on the bets of other users, but also decrease if another player has reached our same goal and decides to withdraw the prize before us.

raw_translation_without_faq.response: 3 Diamonds FashionTV is a unique slot game with a luxury TV channel theme that boasts an impressive RTP value of 97.34% and medium volatility. The game grid features 4 reels and 3 rows, with up to 108 ways to win. Betting options range from 0.50€ to higher amounts, depending on the player's preference. The game's symbols include strawberries, cars, credit cards, and ingots, with the diamond symbol being the most valuable. Two champagne bottles serve as both Wild and Scatter symbols, expanding to cover entire reels and triggering Free Spins when appearing on the right reels. The game's Special Prize feature adds an extra amount to a special counter for each win, with different levels that players can reach and decide whether to cash out or move on.

- No FAQ
- No Notes

response.content: The game grid of 3 Diamonds FashionTV consists of 4 reels and 3 rows. There are up to 108 ways to win, and winning combinations are formed by identical and adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right.

response.content: Players can choose the amount to bet per spin through the bet variable. A single token is worth 0.01€, and the minimum bet at step 1 requires 50, making a single spin cost 0.50€.

response.headline: Symbols and their values
response.content: The symbols in 3 Diamonds FashionTV include the Bar text, strawberries, star, clock, car, credit card, ingots, and diamonds. The values of each symbol can be viewed by hovering the mouse over them when the reels are still. The diamond symbol has the highest value.

response.headline: Special features and bonuses
response.content: 3 Diamonds FashionTV has two special symbols, the champagne bottles, which act as Wild and Scatter symbols. When these symbols appear, they cover the entire reel and reward players with Free Spins. The number of free spins depends on the reel where the symbol appears. Additionally, the game has a Special Prize function, where each win generates an extra amount that goes into a special counter with different levels. Players have the option to cash out or move on to the next level when they reach the threshold for each level. The prize may increase based on the plays of other users but also decrease if another player reaches the same goal and withdraws the prize before the current player.

review_with_topics.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "3Diamonds FashionTV".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

RTP value and volatility
Game grid and ways to win
Betting options
Symbols and their values
Special features and bonuses

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

Review: 3Diamonds FashionTV
The first thing that catches the eye when we face 3 Diamonds FashionTV is the originality of the theme: a TV channel dedicated to luxury and everything that surrounds it. The first impact with the slot is an animated presentation that looks very similar to those typical of movies and TV shows. After the introduction (which we can also decide to skip), the screen opens onto the game grid. The background is a nighttime city with so many lights that it almost looks golden. On the sides of the grid we have two panels, the one on the right wishes us good luck, while the one on the left is a special accumulator whose function we will see later on. 
At the bottom we find various buttons, from the Start to the bet variable, as well as the one that allows us to access the internal menu. 

Slot Features
In 3 Diamonds FashionTV the grid has 4 reels and 3 rows. We win by associating identical and adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. There are up to 108 ways to win and in case of multiple combinations on the same line, only the highest win will be paid. Through the bet variable we can decide the amount to bet for each spin. Considering that a single token is worth 0.01€ and the minimum bet at step 1 requires 50, then a single spin will cost us 0.50€.
One of the strengths of this slot is definitely the very high RTP value, equal to 97.34%. The volatility is medium. 

Symbols and Features
To know the value of the symbols, we just need to point the mouse on each of them when the reels are still. The Bar text has a low value, followed by the strawberries, star, and clock. However, to start seeing some really interesting figures, we must bet on the car, on the credit card or on the ingots, unless we are lucky enough to see the diamond appear!

We then have two special symbols with the double function of Wild and Scatter. These are the champagne bottles, which are expansion symbols and when they appear they cover the whole reel. Moreover, they reward us with Free Spins. The number of free spins depends on the reel where the symbol appears. 

Now let's come to the function called Special Prize: for each win we obtain, but also from other players who are currently on 3 Diamonds FashionTV, an extra amount goes to a special counter with different levels. After reaching the threshold of the first level, we will be asked whether to cash out or move on to the next level. We have thirty seconds to decide. During this time, the prize may increase based on the plays of other users, but also decrease if another player has reached our same goal and decides to withdraw the prize before us.

response.headline: RTP Value and Volatility of the Game
response.content:
Are you tired of playing casino slot games with low RTP values? Look no further than 3 Diamonds FashionTV! With an RTP value of 97.34%, you're sure to hit the jackpot in no time. Well, maybe not no time, but you get the idea.

Not only does this game have an impressive RTP value, but it also falls within the medium volatility range. So, you can expect some decent wins while still enjoying the thrill of the game.

But hey, don't just take my word for it. Give 3 Diamonds FashionTV a spin and see for yourself why this game is the talk of the town.

response.headline: Symbols and Their Values
response.content:
If you're looking for a bit of glitz and glamour in your online slot game, then 3 Diamonds FashionTV is the perfect choice. The symbols in this game are all about living the high life and indulging in luxury, so get ready to feel like a millionaire as you spin the reels.

Of course, not all symbols are created equal in this game. The lowest value symbols might be underwhelming, but you can still enjoy their fun, quirky designs. Who knew strawberries and clocks could be so visually satisfying? If you're lucky, you might just snag a win or two with these symbols.

But let's be honest, we're here for the big wins. And that's where the high-value symbols come in. The car, credit card, and ingots are all worth more than the lower-tier symbols. But if you're really aiming to hit the jackpot, you'll want to keep your eyes peeled for the coveted diamond symbol. This beauty is the most valuable symbol in the game and could make you one happy camper.

So, whether you're a high roller or just looking to have some flashy fun, 3 Diamonds FashionTV has got you covered. Just don't forget your shades, because these symbols are seriously blinding.

All jokes aside, the Special Prize feature adds an extra level of excitement to an already thrilling game. Who wouldn't want a chance at extra cash?

response.headline: Unboxing the Special Features and Bonuses
response.content:
If you're looking for a slot game that offers more than just spinning reels, then 3 Diamonds FashionTV might just be the answer to your prayers. Not only does it offer an attractive and glitzy aesthetic, but it also comes with some unique features and bonuses that make it stand out from the crowd.

For starters, the game has not one, but two special symbols – the champagne bottles! These bottles can act as Wild or Scatter symbols, meaning that they can replace any other symbol to create winning combinations or trigger the Free Spins mode.

But wait, there's more! When a champagne bottle symbol appears, it will expand to cover the entire reel, increasing your chances of scoring a winning combination. And if you manage to land three or more champagne bottles, you'll trigger the Free Spins mode, which gives you a chance to spin the reels without spending a penny. The number of free spins you get depends on which reel the champagne bottles appear on.

If that's not enough to get your heart racing, the game also comes with a Special Prize function. Every time you win, you'll generate an extra amount that goes into a special counter with different levels. When you reach the threshold for each level, you have the option to cash out or move on to the next level. But beware, your prize can decrease if another player reaches the same goal and withdraws the prize before you!

And who knows? Maybe you'll be the lucky player who scores the top prize! It may not make you a fashion icon like the models on FashionTV, but it could certainly put a smile on your face.

faq.answer: The champagne bottles symbols in 3 Diamonds FashionTV serve a double function of Wild and Scatter, and reward players with Free Spins while expanding to cover the entire reel.

faq.question: What is the Special Prize function in 3 Diamonds FashionTV?
faq.answer: The Special Prize function in 3 Diamonds FashionTV rewards players with an extra amount for every win, and for other players who are currently playing the game. The amount goes to a special counter with different levels, and players have the choice to cash out or move on to the next level.

faq.question: What is the volatility rate in 3 Diamonds FashionTV?

faq.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "3Diamonds FashionTV".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: 3Diamonds FashionTV
The first thing that catches the eye when we face 3 Diamonds FashionTV is the originality of the theme: a TV channel dedicated to luxury and everything that surrounds it. The first impact with the slot is an animated presentation that looks very similar to those typical of movies and TV shows. After the introduction (which we can also decide to skip), the screen opens onto the game grid. The background is a nighttime city with so many lights that it almost looks golden. On the sides of the grid we have two panels, the one on the right wishes us good luck, while the one on the left is a special accumulator whose function we will see later on. 
At the bottom we find various buttons, from the Start to the bet variable, as well as the one that allows us to access the internal menu. 

Slot Features
In 3 Diamonds FashionTV the grid has 4 reels and 3 rows. We win by associating identical and adjacent symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. There are up to 108 ways to win and in case of multiple combinations on the same line, only the highest win will be paid. Through the bet variable we can decide the amount to bet for each spin. Considering that a single token is worth 0.01€ and the minimum bet at step 1 requires 50, then a single spin will cost us 0.50€.
One of the strengths of this slot is definitely the very high RTP value, equal to 97.34%. The volatility is medium. 

Symbols and Features
To know the value of the symbols, we just need to point the mouse on each of them when the reels are still. The Bar text has a low value, followed by the strawberries, star, and clock. However, to start seeing some really interesting figures, we must bet on the car, on the credit card or on the ingots, unless we are lucky enough to see the diamond appear!

We then have two special symbols with the double function of Wild and Scatter. These are the champagne bottles, which are expansion symbols and when they appear they cover the whole reel. Moreover, they reward us with Free Spins. The number of free spins depends on the reel where the symbol appears. 

Now let's come to the function called Special Prize: for each win we obtain, but also from other players who are currently on 3 Diamonds FashionTV, an extra amount goes to a special counter with different levels. After reaching the threshold of the first level, we will be asked whether to cash out or move on to the next level. We have thirty seconds to decide. During this time, the prize may increase based on the plays of other users, but also decrease if another player has reached our same goal and decides to withdraw the prize before us.
